FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $assessor := $clickid; LET $questionData := HASH_GET([Question Data], ARRAY_INDEX(HASH_KEYS([Questions]), [Current Question Number])); LET $thisAssessorQuestionData := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_WHERE( $questionData, $(i, item) AND( HASH_GET($item, "Assessor") = $assessor, HASH_GET($item, "Evaluated Party UUID") = [Display ID] ) ));
LET $buildArray := $(fieldname) ( ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(0, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Display ID])), $(i, item) IF( $i = [LineNumber], IF( $fieldname = "Consensus Editing Answer", TRUE,
$fieldname = "Selected Assessor", $assessor,
$fieldname = "Selected Questionnaire RecordID", HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, "RecordID"),
$fieldname = "Selected Questionnaire LineNumber", HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, "LineNumber"),
$fieldname = "Current Answer", COALESCE( HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, "Answer (Date)"), HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, "Answer (Number)"), IF(HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, "Answer (Bool)") == TRUE, "Yes", HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, "Answer (Bool)") == FALSE, "No"), HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, "Answer") ),
HASH_GET($thisAssessorQuestionData, $fieldname) ), EVALUATE("[" & $fieldname & "]#" & $i) ) ) );
RETURN HASH( "Selected Assessor", CALL($buildArray, "Selected Assessor"),
"Selected Questionnaire RecordID", CALL($buildArray, "Selected Questionnaire RecordID"),
"Selected Questionnaire LineNumber", CALL($buildArray, "Selected Questionnaire LineNumber"),
"Current Answer", CALL($buildArray, "Current Answer"),
"Answer", CALL($buildArray, "Answer"),
"Answer (Bool)", CALL($buildArray, "Answer (Bool)"),
"Answer (Date)", CALL($buildArray, "Answer (Date)"),
"Answer (Number)", CALL($buildArray, "Answer (Number)"),
"Image Reference RecordID", CALL($buildArray, "Image Reference RecordID"),
"Document Reference RecordID", CALL($buildArray, "Document Reference RecordID"),
"Comments", CALL($buildArray, "Comments"),
"Consensus Editing Answer", CALL($buildArray, "Consensus Editing Answer") )

LET $title:= DB_LOOKUP( "Standard Questionnaire Name", "Questionnaire", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " &DB_ENCODECONSTANT(ARRAY_FIRST([Selected Questionnaire RecordIDs])) );

TextCriterion.Text: ([Save Allowed] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'system') OR [Type] = 'Digital Submission'

CASE -- Check if user is in role which always has read access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR ([RecordID] < 0 AND (CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members')) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is in role listed on Procurement WHEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Evaluation RecordID] IN ARRAY([To].[Evaluation RecordIDs]) AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in-progress submission for the evaluation record WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Evaluation RecordID] AND [To].[Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if evaluator access has been enabled WHEN ( STEP TO [Evaluation] ON ( [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Evaluation RecordID] AND (CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager]) ) OR ( [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Evaluation RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Panel Member Username] AND [To].[Panel Member Access Allowed] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END
[Save Allowed] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'system'
([Save Allowed] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'system') OR [Type] = 'Digital Submission'

CASE -- Check if user is in role which always has read access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR ([RecordID] < 0 AND (CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members')) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is in role listed on Procurement WHEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Evaluation RecordID] IN ARRAY([To].[Evaluation RecordIDs]) AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in-progress submission for the evaluation record WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Evaluation RecordID] AND [To].[Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if evaluator access has been enabled WHEN ( STEP TO [Evaluation] ON ( [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Evaluation RecordID] AND (CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager]) ) OR ( [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Evaluation RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Panel Member Username] AND [To].[Panel Member Access Allowed] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END
[Save Allowed] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'system'

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $allStatus:= ARRAY_DISTINCT( ARRAY_SELECT( [Questionnaire RecordIDs], $(r, record) HASH_GET( HASH_GET([Questionnaire Header Data], $record), "Status") ));
RETURN IF( ARRAY_INDEXOF($allStatus, "In Progress") >0, "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF($allStatus, "Not Started") >0, "Not Started", ARRAY_INDEXOF($allStatus, "Complete") >0, "Complete", ARRAY_JOIN($allStatus, " ") )
